hadiths.text: It was narrated that 'Ali said:The Messenger of Allah [SAW] said to me: "Say: O Allah, make me steadfast and guide me." And he forbade me to sit on Al-Mayathir." Al-Mayathir: Qassi which the women used to put on the saddles for their husbands, such as red cushions

chapter.ara-name: باب النَّهْىِ عَنِ الْجُلُوسِ، عَلَى الْمَيَاثِرِ مِنَ الأُرْجُوَانِ
chapter.eng-name: Prohibition of Sitting on Red Al-Mayathir
